name: BinaryThresholdProjectionImageFilter
doc: odo this filter should work with VectorImages too.

members.name: ThresholdValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the input value consider as "threshold". Defaults to NumericTraits<InputPixelType>::max()
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the input value consider as "threshold". Defaults to NumericTraits<InputPixelType>::max()

members.name: ForegroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the output value used as "foreground". Defaults to maximum value of PixelType.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the output value used as "foreground". Defaults to maximum value of PixelType.

members.name: BackgroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the output value used as "background". Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::NonpositiveMin().
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the output value used as "background". Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::NonpositiveMin().
